channel.title: Translation on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo
channel.description: Recent content in Translation on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo

item.title: Translating the Illustrative Mathematics K-8 Educational Resources
item.description: I was recently invited to participate in a webinar as the lead Spanish translator of the Illustrative Mathematics K-8 Curriculum (see here). The main point they wanted me to discuss was what was our process translating the resources, and why a simple word-for-word translation like that could be put into Google insufficient. As a preparation for this webinar, I decided to write this blog entry describing detailed answers to this prompt.
